content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the case involved two parties the defendant and the applicant but the text does not provide further details about the nature of the case the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the movable property including cars and a motorcycle was awarded to the defendant while the immovable property an apartment was awarded to the applicant the court also ordered the applicant to pay the defendant compensation for a greater share of the property the court discussed various articles related to matrimonial property in the civil code the applicant sought a divorce division of property financial compensation and child maintenance the defendant agreed to some requests but disputed the amount of child maintenance the court decided to award the apartment to the applicant and ruled that the parties obligation towards a bank loan should remain joint and several the court considered the best interests of the child the court rejected the applicants request to defer payment of compensation and ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings the court granted the dissolution of the marriage and made several decisions regarding the division of property the applicant was awarded an apartment and a bmw as personal property the court ordered the applicant to pay the defendant compensation and the obligations towards the bank were modified the defendant was ordered to pay various costs including stamp duty and procedural document serving costs the remainder of the action was dismissed
